website_summaries.verdict: For restless sleepers who are highly sensitive, we recommend these comfortable ear plugs.
pros: Easy to pinch and insert into the ear canal
Effectively block out noises from construction, snoring, pets, music and other loud disturbances that might interrupt your sleep
cons: Some find the earbuds too small

customer_reviews.title: Nope, nope, nope
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the purple Flents QT Ear Plugs, hoping they would block even more sound than the last brand I ordered, which were pretty good. I am a small female, so these should have been plenty big around enough to stay secure and block out sound. Not so much. They do not expand completely, and when they do, the diameter just doesn't cut it. Hubby snoring, dog wheezing, all were clear as a bell. I spent half the night re-rolling them and trying everything I could think of, to no avail. I bought the big tub of them too! I'll be re-ordering my last brand and tossing these.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: These may work well, but unless you want to sleep in what smells like a glue factory don't buy these. I don't know how these passed any kind of quality control. 1 star only for their ability to reduce sound.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT soft people!!
customer_reviews.text: This material is NOT, I repeat NOT soft. I found them incredibly uncomfortable and difficult to manipulate to even put in my ears. I thought maybe I got a bad pack and when I went to return them I was shocked to see that you can't return them. The product description says they are soft and they are like trying to insert cinder blocks into your ears. Oh and if you make it a night with them in your ears, you are left with intense pain the following day....steer clear and by something else folks.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect after some modifications
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs are great, but definitely need some modification if your ears are small like mine. I do prefer these over the macks ear plugs. I was told that Flent's makes ear plugs for small ears (I believe they are the super sleep comfort). I tend to sleep on my side often so these ear plugs were hurting my ears. They felt bruised when I woke up in the morning and there were times when they fell out. I actually cut the end piece on each of them just enough so that they were flushed with my ear and I never had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Song

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, really wanted these to work. After reading several favorable reviews I decided to order them. So: they’re hard. They don’t stay put in your ear unless you jam them in. They’re very uncomfortable. You can literally still hear everything including now your heart beat in your ear. Purchased these because of noisy neighbors. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Mack's Shooters Ear Seals for my work, but I have decided to try these for hearing protection instead. I like these much more, they are more comfortable when inserting and removing. In addition to being more effective since they have a higher NRR. I would recommend these to anyone who might need hearing protection.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gallik

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: These plugs are big and hard. Could not get them to stay in my ears so cannot comment on how well they work for noise reduction. Definitely not for sleeping unless you like the feeling of an acorn stuffed in your outer ear.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Red

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I might just have small ears but they are very uncomfortable they give me headaches I tried cutting them like I saw in someone else’s post but it’s no better. And they don’t cancel out the noise I can’t still hear everything going on around so I’m just in pain for no reason I cant wear them for more than 15 mins because my head starts to hurt and the inside of my ears start to feel weird like a burn ich type of feelings. I really just want to return them and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Tais Gorguet

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would you like purple dye on your pillows? Then don't buy. Garbage product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Venier

customer_reviews.title: Life/Marriage Saver
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from horrible insomnia and the slightest noise can wake me up. I started wearing ear plugs because my husband's snoring sounded like a flock of geese shouting at each other. Even with white noise, fans, and a portable A/C, I couldn't drown his snoring out enough for me to fall asleep. I have probably tried 10+ brands trying to find earplugs that are comfortable and save me from wanting to smother him with a pillow. Other brands were either too soft and did nothing or painful and still did nothing. These are firm but malleable and I cant sleep without them. One pair can provide weeks of use with proper ear care and cleaning. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Season

customer_reviews.title: Wow- Amazing, but read instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying ear plugs because where I live is very loud at night when I'm trying to sleep. I didn't think they worked at first because I didn't read the instructions on what you have to do before putting them in your ear. Once I finally noticed the instructions and followed them - WOW- amazing. I use them all the time. Life savers!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh, horrible earplugs
customer_reviews.text: These were not fresh- they take a long time to expand. And they are a little longer than my previous brand. And now I have 50. ☹ Update...my original review is spot on. These are terrible - worst earplugs I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: hike4diamonds

customer_reviews.title: Good product... bad chemical odor present.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the (green label Flents) in the past and was so pleased with the product that I thought I would give the (purple label Flents) a try. I was very pleased with the purchase. They fit well and work as advertised. My only concern was that when I opened the container, I was met with a pungent chemical odor. It was so strong that I had to empty the entire contents of the container and let everything air out. This would be a 5star rating if the chemical odor was not present. Overall, I would still recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Unique Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Sleep- and marriage-saver!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a snorer, perhaps the loudest snorer ever. Think a werewolf juggling chainsaws, and you're almost there. He's tried so many things to stop snoring, from those nose strips to OTC pills, but they don't work very well. I'm a light sleeper, so I was spending a lot of sleepless nights away from my beloved husband. Thanks to these earplugs, I'm back in our bed, and I enjoy a restful night's sleep! They don't completely cancel the noise. Occasionally, I can still hear the snoring through the plugs, but it's much better. I don't think this is the fault of the plugs. Just know that they're not noise-cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Sebastian-Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and effective for sleep
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my uses and comfy! I’ve been buying these from Walmart for years. I enjoyed getting these via amazon with the pandemic and the large container makes them last a while and makes me less likely to use for longer than I should. I wear these nightly and they’re comfy. They stick out a bit out of the ear canal but I feel most ear plugs do and it doesn’t make it uncomfortable. They keep noise like traffic and my boyfriend getting up in the mornings away. I’m not sure it would work for snoring but most earplugs don’t. These work better than those dumb “pink” ones they market for women. I’m a female btw
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Get plugged
customer_reviews.text: I'm a light sleeper and a frequent concert goer, so I've tried most of the earplug brands, and these purple Flents have been the best I've found so far. Nice foam density and shaping, low profile enough to sleep comfortably with them in, and the color is a bit more discreet than other earplugs. They sometimes get a bit itchy for me, but that might be caused by the spiders that nest in my ear canal. I'll keep using these until I find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Brooklyn landlords suck
customer_reviews.text: My radiator rattles constantly and my landlord and management company refuse to be diligent enough to solve the problem (honestly I think it's echoing through the pipes from another unit!) Because of this during the winter I cannot sleep in my bedroom and am woken up multiple times in the night. Sleeping with ear plugs nightly isn't ideal but thanks to these I can sleep through the night. They completely block out the rattling sounds and let me fall asleep. They are easy to use and comfortable. Just make sure you get them in deep enough for maximum sound blockage. These are a winter must have until I can afford to move >_<.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: 99% perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, the perfect remedy to my problem: the bathroom is right across my room, so whenever any of my roomates has to use the bathroom in the early AMs, their rummaging around wakes me right up. I can't exactly tell them to hold their bathroom until I'm up in the morning, so these were my next best option. These really do block out the noise, now I sleep right through the rummaging. My only complaint is that these fall out my ears at some point in the night, which doesn't bother me as long as they get me through the early AMs.
customer_reviews.author: Keiko Long

customer_reviews.title: I wear earplugs nightly, and these are my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I live next to a highway and my windows have ZERO noise cancellation, so I wear earplugs to bed every night. These are by far my favorite- they're comfortable, they are a good size so they rarely fall out in my sleep, and they block the noise of the highway but still allow me to wake up when my alarm blares. I've tried the Medicook earplugs and the green Flents earplugs, but theses are the BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for screaming baby
customer_reviews.text: I have been through quite a few different ear plugs and have found these to be some of the best. I have horrible anxiety that is intensified with loud noises, especially cries/screams from my newborn. These foamies bring that screaming down to a level I can handle and still allow for me to hear the softer cries in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sleeping.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these ear plugs for multiple years. Living in a house with roommates, I don't enjoy being woken up at the wrong times.I use these most nights to ensure I don't get interrupted. They're very good for noise cancellation, I can't hear most usual noises with them in (people in the kitchen, doors opening and closing). However, if you're trying to avoid base tones, they don't work super effectively. The can drown out some base, but if it's loud enough you're still going to hear it. Good for concerts too.
customer_reviews.author: SlimeBallBuilder

customer_reviews.title: Ear Plugs
customer_reviews.text: I use these ear plugs for many purposes. I use them when I target practice with my 40 cal. and 9mm. handguns. I use the plugs when I am mowing grass and they provide perfect ear protection for both activities. I also use them when I sleep. I am a light sleeper and they are made of a light-weight sponge material and are so comfortable that it is possible to forget you are wearing ear plugs. great value in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: James Hysmith

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only ear plugs that don't hurt my ears. I must have small ear canals because other brands cause my ears to ache so much it wakes me up. I never have those problems with these ear plugs. I use them every night and now I can't sleep without them. They work to block out background noise and noisy kids most importantly. They are not enough to block out all sounds, which is fine because I have no problem hearing my alarm in the morning. I hope they never stop making these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Green and purple both good
customer_reviews.text: Tried them both for my motorcycle. The green ones are most definitely the best plugs I’ve ever tried. Update these ones are actually legit too!!! I am trying them this round And they are money!!! Just tried the purple. they are both amazing. I say get them both and switch back and forth. The purples cut a little more sound at first but then stretch out your ears and it’s uncomfortable and they aren’t bigger. I think the green ones may not cut as much maybe but definitely more comfortable after longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: Good product for noise sensitive folks and avoid hearing loss around real loud stuff
customer_reviews.text: Buy this brand routinely I Live near dirt bikes, helicopters, back hoes and power tools so must have. They cut out enough noise to sleep through rooster and barking dogss if window is closed and abate loud motors a great deal yet you can hear people talk to youm or an alarm albeit more faintly if they aren't too far away. I have used a pair two or three times for economy but directions say and they work best if each pair used just once and the price is low enough to do that
customer_reviews.author: Missymiss

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Well For NIghtly Use
customer_reviews.text: I never used to be a light sleeper. However, that changed once my neighbor got a dog who would wake us up in the wee hours of the night and early morning. I pop a pair of these in my ears every night and now I feel spoiled without them!! I will say this can’t cancel out ALL NOISES, but it does help to drown out most (with the exception of my partner’s HEAVY SNORING episodes). I change out new plugs every week to avoid ear infections and for hygienic purposes. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: If they only stayed in place
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these 100% but I didn’t. The ear plugs would fall out every night. Sometimes just one and other times it was both. I used these before when I was in Nashville and they worked amazing (Airbnb provides them). So when I arrived back home, I made sure to order the same exact ear plugs. To my surprise, they didn’t stay in place like when I first tried them out. I guess I’ll keep using them until they’re all lost behind the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne C

customer_reviews.title: Old and stiff. Buy fresh ones instead.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these earplugs every night for the last 25 years (snoring spouse). I thought I was really smart ordering the jumbo package from Amazon. Wrong. As you know these need to be soft so they can be rolled small to fit and then expand in the ear. These must be old or something because they are not soft and once rolled to fit in the ear they don’t expand back to block noise.
customer_reviews.author: Getting by

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few weeks now and I wanted to give it a while before I write a review. It is the most uncomfortable type of earplugs I've ever used. They're too hard and long (so they stick out making it uncomfortable to sleep on your sides, and they're so hard that you end up taking it out somewhere in the middle of the night). Either I take it out, or they come out by themselves as I'm moving around when I'm sleeping! I gave it two stars just because the price is reasonable for the amount of earplugs you get. Otherwise, I do not recommend buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Hurt less than other brands
customer_reviews.text: All earplugs hurt my ear canal, but his brand is the best I have found. When I lubricate my ear canal with coconut oil before inserting, they seldom hurt. I am still looking for an ear plug that does not hurt, but until I find one, I will continue to use this one. I have tried some "softer" ones, but they allow too much sound.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Not my good old Hearos
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used blue Hearos earplugs for years and they work perfectly for me. They are currently unavailable so I thought I’d give these a try. Unfortunately they did not work for me at all. They are smaller around and fall out of my ears at the slightest movement. I would recommend these if you have had problems with earplugs being too big, I.e., if your ear canal is very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jass

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for year. These ear plugs are super soft, very comfortable for over night use, and do a good job of eliminating noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: these barely fit in the ear and stick out preventing comfortable sleep. woke up with a big headache and earache. do not recommend if you have smaller ears. disappointed and want to return but it says I can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: They are fairly large, so you would have to attempt to roll them up really tightly in order to fit them in the ear canal. Since they don’t fit well, they don’t work well in blocking noise. Not good for sleeping either because they are a bit uncomfortable and will keep falling out because they are difficult to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best ever foam blockers for loud snoring and other noise!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best ear plugs on the market. They are soft foam with great noise-blocking qualities. Inserted correctly, they will block out loud snoring, fans, road noise, and other random distractions. They can be used more than once. In fact, I use them many times before moving on to the next pair. They come with a little plastic case which will hold two plugs for travel. I have washed them in the sink. I won’t buy any other ear plugs from now on. Great invention.
customer_reviews.author: Travels With Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Shaped for comfort and works like you expect it to
customer_reviews.text: These are soft enough as to not hurt my ears but still give me a great fit. I have tries several kinds of plugs over the years and I love these. I use them every day while motorcycling, running the lawn equipment and sometimes at night. These cut the noise down to nearly nothing. This is now the 3rd bag of this product and not the last
customer_reviews.author: K.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best Earplugs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used ear plugs for 12 years and this brand has been my favorite. I used to have to buy them at Walmart but when I found them here on amazon I was extremely happy. Having the noise cancellation be 33 is very important to me and a lot of places only sell ones that are 32 and surprisingly it makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Block out the noise and allow a good night’s sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Started out with a smaller pack from the local store and then opted to buy these online. Great price for a ton of them. It will take a bit of time to get used to them in your ears but once you do you’ll be glad you bought them! They block out the noise and allow me a good night’s sleep. I can still hear my alarm go off in the morning which was a big concern for me when trying ear plugs for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I first found them as a ten pack at a supermarket and was pleased to find such a large set here
customer_reviews.text: I have small ear canals and so far this is the only brand I've found that's tolerable. Other brands are too large and hurt my ears, despite being only foam. I first found them as a ten pack at a supermarket and was pleased to find such a large set here. I wear them to sleep because of snoring housemates and a night schedule that leaves me at odds with landscaping crews and loud, day-roaming neighbors. Since finding them, I can sleep through all but most snores and I sometimes take them to work to block out the obnoxious machinery when I really need to concentrate.
customer_reviews.author: Magna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed: too small, too slow, not returnable
customer_reviews.text: Twice as expensive as the others I had been using. Take forever to decompress. I took a video and the difference is dramatic. Don't believe the reviewers who said these are large, those reviews lost me $14 on a non returnable item. I wish pictures of the individual earplugs had been posted before I wasted my money. I took a video too but can't load it. Took longer than 1 minute longer to get back to original shape compared to Howard Leight Max NRR33. Buy those instead. I gave it 2 stars because they have good reviews by others so must have some redeeming qualities. If they really are NRR33 those are hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmaly (maven and I know it)

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ear plug! Have tried many others, but this particular model delivers the best results for me. I have a great deal of trouble sleeping and noise is a real problem for me. When’s many find white noise soothing, I do not. I crush them down before inserting, and they expand in the ear to make an effective sound deadening seal. I don’t wear any other brand since I found these.
customer_reviews.author: SMS1253

customer_reviews.title: Almost a 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I would give them a 5 star but i had to give them a 4. Ive tried other noise cancelling ear plugs before and they were easy twist and insert into your ears. These ones on the other hand untwist so quick it takes longer to get them in your ear. They are very comfortable, stay in all through the night, and cancel out all sounds from electronics. Im very happy with them over all and will definitely purchase them again
customer_reviews.author: Chike U.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent noise canceling for sleep and meditation
customer_reviews.text: These are supposedly only 1 decibel better than the green but I swear they are twice as good. Never thought plain foam earplugs could work this well. They are a little stiff but rolling back and forth with your fingers seems to make it better. Still quite comfortable. Will buy again for certain.
customer_reviews.author: Coghan

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different ear plugs. I have to wear them to sleep. Wearing ear plugs all night causes me discomfort. These cause the least amount of discomfort than any other ear plug I've tried. If you are a light sleeper who wants to retain their ear health, these plugs are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headaches, and horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I love the brand since I’ve use previous earbuds. But I ordered these and they have given me a headache every time I’ve use them. When I went to return them the item is not eligible for returning and thats horrible customer service. I was planning on returning this style and ordering their “super sleep, blue earbuds” but not anymore! I am a loyal customer of their brand but this style is hurting my head.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Buy these and u will never buy another kind again.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years and years but cant find them in this bulk container anymore. They r sold in smaller quantities and not only will i go thru then fast, the cost ends up way more. When i saw this bulk package i had to buy them. I do have a little hard time hearing but the loud snoring and fan sounds bother my sleep tremendously. Once i started using these, I dont hear a thing. They make my sleep so peaceful I even wear them when i take a nap. These r wonderful. Tried every other kind i could find and NONE came close to these. U need to buy these and no other kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed in late 2018
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: These earplugs have recently changed. Visibly there are more air bubbles in the plugs, and they don't block as much noise. So tired of companies doing this. And just tired, because I can't sleep as well. OLD REVIEW: Comfortable and effective! I've tried a few other brands and these work the best. I take away a star because they do smell weird and irritate my ears from time-to-time.
customer_reviews.author: Amaryllis Belladonna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the quiet please ear pug (cylindrical, cream color) and am very satisfied with how much noise it'll shut out. I wanted to buy a jar, but I could only find this purple one and the green one, so gave it a try. The effect is totally different. I didn't try the green one, but the purple one is too soft and too long. Yes, it's comfortable because it's soft but at the same time you get more noise. And it's long so anything near your ear will knock it off your ear. I'll go back to the cream one I was using. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cockatoo

customer_reviews.title: Confortable and great at cancelling noise.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this particular brand for years, because I have a snorer husband. These are the most comfortable, and best at canceling noise of all brands I have tried. Other ones I have tried make my ears sweaty or stick to my ears, these never do. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Green

customer_reviews.title: Do you want to 💤 sleep?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Flents ear plugs the early '90's to help me sleep during the day as I worked 7pm-3am. I tried other brands and was not happy. I even used the Flents green plugs, didn't like them. For my money and a good night's sleep, it's Flents Purple for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tidbit

customer_reviews.title: These are the frickin best
customer_reviews.text: Honestly.... this saved my sanity. I live in the loudest apartment on this planet and I use these to sleep or when I’m studying. They’re quite comfortable but regardless they block out 85%-90% of the sound. I really really love these and am so happy I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have a lot of trouble with ear plus because I have small ears. When I put these in, I kind of twist them so they are small and they fit well. Then they expand back to normal shape/size as much as your ears allow, but not too much to crowd your ear. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these in the past and have been very pleased. However, on my recent order, made within the last month I found that they do not fully expand in my ear and then fall out during the night. I'm not sure if this was an old batch in which the foam has lost its ability to expand but whatever the case, they do not work as they should. I tried to return them and was told that this is a nonreturnable item. As a result, I won't be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Hresanthe

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Wasn’t sure about them with all these companies cheapening out Are ruining their masterful earplugs. Uh hem. Hearos. But these are the superior of the inferior for sure in my mind. So happy I found them. PLEASE FOR GODS SAKE DONT CHANGE THE FORMULA TO SAVE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Did What it said it would
customer_reviews.text: These are really Comfortable. My reason for the purchase was I was disturbed by outside cars going by and loud Stores and Loud environments. They blocked out a lot of the bad noises and fell as a safety net and help with anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: TRUST ME

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, works great, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I work in dog grooming and sometimes it gets loud! I bought these twice so far- great value for the price and the noise cancellation factor is excellent. They are also very comfortable. I need a lot of them because once they’re out of my ears they tend to get covered in dog hair and I don’t want to put hairy earplugs back in my ears hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely addictive.
customer_reviews.text: I am the worlds lightest sleeper "In my opinion at least" I have to have a fan running in the middle of winter and have a pillow dedicated to on top of my head when I sleep. With all that these are still the ONLY earplugs I have ever used that consistently allow me to sleep, I don't EVER want to be without them. so Yea... I'm addicted.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Katagasm

customer_reviews.title: The best earplugs I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a bunch of different earplugs (I wear them every night) and always go back to these. I I have smaller ear canals, but some for smaller ear canals are too short and I worry about them getting stuck. Other foam earplugs almost start to hurt at some point. For noise cancellation and comfort, these are the best in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Treisner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these earplugs. The cancel out enough noise that I don’t feel dead, but can still get a good, I distracted sleep. I find the to be comfortable and never fall out throughout the night. Easy to pinch and insert.
customer_reviews.author: J. McKeon

customer_reviews.title: I Reordered Them if That Tells You Anything
customer_reviews.text: I can't tolerate snoring which is not surprising, but I also can't tolerate loud breathing. These cancel out the loud breathing completely and muffle the snoring. Some snores are so loud it renders these useless but in those cases I wake my husband up and tell him to turn on his side. I roll the ends of the plugs between my fingers, making them pointy, then pull on my ear and shove them in there, they fit in pretty good. I'll wear them a couple of times before throwing them out. I don't go to sleep without them in.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Muehlenkamp

customer_reviews.title: I'm sleeping better than ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are great - comfortable and they keep out most of the noise. My husband is a power snorer, so he does sometimes still wake me but not nearly as often. Only about 5% of the time instead of multiple times every night. I feel great!
customer_reviews.author: WistfulDreamer

customer_reviews.title: The cure for noisy neighbors
customer_reviews.text: After living in rent for 50 years, I figured I had been through it all ... until my new neighbors moved in below. After several sleepless nights enduring their party all night (and sleep all day) rudeness, I got these plugs and they work like a charm. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Keith A Gery

customer_reviews.title: Product changed?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if is the ones that amazon sells or what. Next time I'll buy wherever I used to. These ear plugs are super hard, your ear will hurt. Nothing like they used to be. These used to be my favorite ones. Noise wise they seem to be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota

customer_reviews.title: work okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so that I could have some peace. I have two kids, one of which doesn't realize the volume of her voice and I write. It's fairly hard to concentrate. I got these to help me get some quiet in an otherwise not so quiet environment. I like the travel case. That's cute and helpful. They work okay in use. I have them in now and I can still hear the kids playing 2 rooms over and they aren't even playing very loud. Maybe I'm doing it wrong. It IS much quieter and easier to focus at least. Maybe I'm just picky.
customer_reviews.author: nnylamom

customer_reviews.title: THEY DO NOT WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing like the product description. The ear plugs do not expand at all. They are too long and because they don't expand they fall off and do not work. Not eligible for return so DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flents Quiet Time Ear Plugs
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these Flents Quiet Time Ear Plugs for about a year now for sleeping. These ear plugs really drown out the external noises and allow for a deep sleep. I would not recommend these ear plugs for sleeping if you don't have someone else to wake you up when the alarm goes off in the morning!! I would have slept through quite a few alarms if it weren't for my wife to wake me! They work that well for sleeping!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Russo

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better on the market!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best on the market for sleeping next to a snoring bear!!!! LOL. Seriously though. I twist them and stick these into my ear canal deep and they don't come out in the middle of then night, they don't make my ears itch and my ears are rarely sore from wearing them every night. I also find that I can reuse a pair for 2 or 3 nights and they're even better used as they soften up. But this brand and these ones in particular are a staple in my home and no other brand has ever been good enough or better.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaPaws239

customer_reviews.title: Buy the cream colored cylindrical ones instead
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a snorer. He sometimes wakes himself up with his snoring and is in general sensitive to noise. As a result, we go through a lot of earplugs and used earplugs can be found scattered in our house like confetti. So yes, we use a lot of earplugs. And these ones suck. They fall out of my ear in the middle of the night and enrage me. I tested against the cylindrical cream colored foam ones which are in my opinion vastly superior even though they have a lower noise rating.
customer_reviews.author: Sneha

customer_reviews.title: Nasty smell, and doesn't fit as snug as other brands
customer_reviews.text: These don't seem to fit as snug as other brands I've used in the past, so they might not block as much noise. Also, there is a really foul odor every time I take the cap off the container to pull out some earplugs. I have to assume there is some chemical in there (typical from China made products). I just hope I'm not exposing myself to those chemicals every time I put them in my ears, which are so close to the brain.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Decent noise cancelation
customer_reviews.text: I removed 2 stars due to a weird chemical smell present with my recent purchase that was not present in my previous orders of the same product. I exchanged it and the potent chemical smell was present again so I had to thoroughly wash each one.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor!
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs smell strongly of chemicals and irritate my ears for weeks after wearing them. I've worn others in the past and did not have this reaction. I do not have sensitive skin or allergies. I'm not sure if it's the foam or the dye that gives off the strong odor but whatever it is this company needs to change their recipe. The sound protection does not out weigh the reaction. Buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Angelrandb

customer_reviews.title: For smaller ears
customer_reviews.text: Loved these. I used them while flying and also when studying. They are perfect for smaller ears that aren`t used to having anything in them. No discomfort. Blocked enough noise out but still had some idea of what was going on around me. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item for those with noise sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: We have these in our dental clinic for those sensitive to noise. Feedback is that they work perfectly for the purpose at hand. Each guest in need receives these and then they are theirs to take home.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Y

customer_reviews.title: Blocks sound but not for petite ears
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I have tried just about every earplug out there. I have extremely small ears and most earplugs are too big. I need them to drown out the snoring coming from my husband. These earplugs definitely block sound fairly well. So that is why I giving 4 stars. My issue is that they are huge and don't stay in my ears all night. If you do not need small earplugs these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out my neighbor's snoring
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my neighbor snores so loud I can hear it through my wall. These completely cancel out everything. Just make sure your alarm is loud or near your head lol. Otherwise you might miss it. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Warren

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and they work!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use them for sleeping in order to drown out cars doing by, snoring family members and pets and even a hedgehog who runs on his wheel at night. Most of the time it completely drowns out the noise, occasionally if someone is watching TV I do have to ask them to turn it down a little if the bass is too high- but with the plugs in I can't hear what the TV is saying, just that there is some noise. Overall these are amazing! I find I can reuse them several times as well without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big diameter
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help with my husband’s snoring but this brand is too big for my ears and they are uncomfortable. I wish I hadn’t bought such a big container because they are useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Hoggan

customer_reviews.title: Best earplugs ever
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to earplugs to sleep every night for about a decade now. Was nervous about buying them online vs the store. But they are the same exact earplugs that I buy from the store and same great quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cappello

customer_reviews.title: Good to avoid noise
customer_reviews.text: We use this ear plug to avoid neighborhoods noise (especially during weekends), it helps a lot and we can finally sleep well. Tips is to make sure it go deep enough so you won’t hear any sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Kathereen T.

customer_reviews.title: The best ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: I tried these years ago, and was so happy to find them again on amazon. They are the best ear plugs. The person who introduced them to me described them as pillows for your ears, and that is accurate. They are so comfortable. They are easy to mold into the shape of my ears, they stay in place, and they keep out so much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: these work well
customer_reviews.text: I am a light sleeper, and both my husband and my large dog snore. Ear plugs have saved me from insomnia! These work fine, this shape/style is the best I have found for all night use. ALL ear plugs make my ears sore by morning, but with these there is minimal soreness. I had hoped they were a tad smaller since one of the other reviews suggested as much, but they seem to be fairly standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal K. Grant

customer_reviews.title: The Sounds of Silence
customer_reviews.text: I have been using earplugs for many years and I have never used any that compare to these. The just shut the noise out completely. Nothing gets through. Further, they fit well in your ear and don't fall out during a night's sleep. I am amazed at how much better these work than any others I have used. If you want the sounds of silence these are the earplugs for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buck

customer_reviews.title: They work for me. Good night's sleep. Comfortable. Convenient.
customer_reviews.text: This is about right for ear plugs. Can use them every night. They're quite effective an comfortable. Soft yet easy to put in and lasts long enough to be convenient. I've tried other brands that are individually wrapped but what a mess and hassle. I've tried others that are goopier and others that are too hard a foam. Those are just not as nice. These strike the perfect balance.
customer_reviews.author: Fixer-upper

customer_reviews.title: Softer than usual
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before and love them. For some reason the last ones that arrived were much 'squishier'. So weird. Normally they are a bit tougher at 1st then after a couple wears they feel squishy. Highly recommend them if they are the right version! It makes a huge difference in the noise cancellation!
customer_reviews.author: The Greens

customer_reviews.title: The container is sturdy and easy to open every night before bed
customer_reviews.text: Got these because I was tired of waking up with sore ears from those pink and yellow industrial-strength earplugs. These don't hurt my ears even after hours of sleeping with them in. The noise blockage is comparable to the heavy-duty individually-wrapped kind, but they're a bit less pliable and tend to go less deep into your ear. I haven't had a problem with them falling out, though. The container is sturdy and easy to open every night before bed!
customer_reviews.author: tinytv

customer_reviews.title: Drowns our the snoring and tv so I can sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Husband snores like a freight train..... these are very good for drowning out his snoring and the tc when I want to go to sleep before he does. You do not need a new pair every night. A pair lasts me at least a week.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda M. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and effective
customer_reviews.text: These have a surprisingly effective noise reduction ability. They are comfortable, but not as quick to insert and extract as the Moldex Comets I previously used. From a cost and value standpoint, I find them very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: When inserted properly (roll between thumb and finger, then place in ear canal), these ear plugs block 95% of sound! I compared these with the silicone, segmented type ear plugs and these worked much more efficiently at blocking sound. Also, these feel better because they completely conform to your ear canal. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AlpineRainn

customer_reviews.title: Hurt your ear if for sleep, might be good used for study orconstruction
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs can conceal most of the sound. BUT, it is not very soft and grow a lot in your ears. Sleep with these hurts a lot with my ears even caused infections... If you don't have really big ear canal, try others first...
customer_reviews.author: Stantler

customer_reviews.title: They suck- no returns either!  Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: These don’t block hardly any sound. Wish I could give zero stars, wasted $10!! Can’t even return this junk!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable ear plugs I've ever used. Only problem is they have a very strong smell. Once they are out of the box a while the smell sort of goes away but it is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Celiaann Kulmala

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My husband snores like he is getting paid to do it so it was either earplugs or make a permanent spot on the couch for one of us. These earplugs are very comfy while being great at noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Dazzlebeth

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Hubs uses these to block out the sounds of the birds in the morning and they work well. They don't cancel out our cat that meows at 4:30am each day. Can't win 'em all.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Can't sleep without them now
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I have tried so many pairs of ear plugs but these fit into my ears great. I have a cat who loves to cause trouble and be loud at night and these help me sleep great. He now knows that being loud won't get me up and has changed his behavior as well. These saved my sanity and my sleep.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful. They work well to mute noise
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. They work well to mute noise, but it doesn't mean you won't hear anything. It is enough so that I don't hear the kids making a racket in another room, but somehow my alarm will still wake me up, which is perfect for me. Also, I have small ear canals and these are the only ear plugs amongst the many I have tried that do not cause my ears to ache. With other ear plugs, I end up waking up in the middle of the night and have to take them out because they hurt so much. No such problems with these, but I also do not put them in super far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy upstair neighbors
customer_reviews.text: I live below some fat butt people that have no carpeting in their apartment. During the day they are pounding and making all kinds of noise. I even had to call the police on them a couple of times because they were fighting. the drunk guy even tried to come downstairs and say he was not making any noise after the police left. I simply put these in my ears and i could not hear is drunken voice calling me all kinds of names. And these work when i go to sleep by helping keep the noise of the elephants above me. If I wanted to live below elephants i would have gone to Brookfield Zoo.
customer_reviews.author: Pete In Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Really an excellent choice for cheaper ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: Really an excellent choice for cheaper ear plugs. A little bit longer than some comparable brands so that they can be pulled out pretty easily, and they are excellent at actually blocking the amount of noise that they advertise. I switched back to these after buying Macks because the Macks didn't even touch the sound that these blocks. The little carrier that comes with can hold about 6 pairs of plugs, enough for a week or so trip, which is pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Phil K

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my ears!
customer_reviews.text: Memory foam material used is too hard and does not expand fast enough once squeezed and inserted in the ears. Hurts my ears after a few minutes. I bought "Hearos" ear plugs for comparison and they are much softer and expands really well inside my ears. I wanted to return them, but these are not returnable! So, I threw it in the garbage can and out goes my $11.00!
customer_reviews.author: love2_golf2

customer_reviews.title: Happy sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: The condo I live in is really poorly built and I can hear pretty much every sound my upstairs neighbors make. I specifically hear them at night when I am trying to sleep. I have tried many types of earplugs and have even spent up to 40 dollars on earplugs because I was so desperate for sleep. These are the best by far that I've tried! They are great at blocking noise, are comfortable and don't fall out. Blocks noise well and I am still able to wake up to my alarm!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use, great value
customer_reviews.text: Soft, easy to use, comfortable, great value, sending some with my daughter to camp, also use them when I have a noise sensitive migraine
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

product_meta.title: Flents Ear Plugs, 50 Pair, Ear Plugs for Sleeping, Snoring, Loud Noise, Traveling, Concerts, Construction, & Studying, NRR 33
product_meta.description: Size:50 PairFlents quiet time comfort foam ear plugs. 50 pair.Flents Quiet Time Ear Plugs (50 Pair)
feature_bullets: HEARING PROTECTION: for Sleeping, Loud Noise, Concerts, Construction, Heavy Machinery, Music, and other loud environments. Also great for creating silence
CONVENIENT: Jar holds 50 Pairs, Easy to Take Anywhere
COMFORTABLE FIT: Smooth, Comfortable, Extra soft and extra light foam that tapers to your ear canal for a custom fit

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
